Control Name: 4.5 Ensure SQL server's TDE protector is encrypted with Customer-managed key
Control Statement: TDE with Customer-managed key support provides increased transparency and control over the TDE Protector, increased security with an HSM-backed external service, and promotion of separation of duties.
